content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, nice to meet you. I am not interested in talking about anything other than the rental price. Let's focus on that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understand. So, I start with the price of 1000 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can do better than that. How about 1200 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your offer, but I have to say that is too high for me. I can offer 850 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can't go that low. Let's meet in the middle. How about 1075 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. I can offer 900 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'll accept 1050 Euro per month. This is as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still cannot agree to that price. I can offer 950 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'll meet you in the middle. How about 1000 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's closer to what I had in mind. I can offer 975 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [975] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
